entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -15.9°C

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: E 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
